normalised: Arre bhai, unko meneda mitte august rege daprae taben khan? Gadao serma, Independence Day parade uru taben! Hoytoh senap serma chenda mitte august chendao rege manao jo dar kar? Bahno, emang ting meneda, bara so taras serma re, pakka har talak rege menah taben chai-pakora somoi!
